title: Notice of Q3 and 9M 2015 ifrs results (OAO NLMK - Novolipetskiy Metallurgicheskiy Kombinat)
text: ( Source : OAO NLMK - Novolipetskiy Metallurgicheskiy Kombinat ) NLMK ( LSE : NLMK) will be announcing its consolidated IFRS results for Q3 and 9M 2015 on Monday, November 09 , 2015. NLMK is pleased to invite the investment community to a
